requirements.plaintext: Complete The Chi of Yore and Ritou Escape Plan Have Someone's Drifting Bottle in your inventory
requirements.markdown: Complete ◀The Chi of Yore▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Chi_of_Yore▷ and ◀Ritou Escape Plan▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Ritou_Escape_Plan▷ Have ◀Someone's Drifting Bottle▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Someone%27s_Drifting_Bottle▷ in your inventory

steps.plaintext: Go to the north of Narukami Island to find traces of Shun
steps.markdown: Go to the north of ◀Narukami Island▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Narukami_Island▷ to find traces of ◀Shun▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Shun▷

steps.plaintext: Go to Jueyun Karst to search for Sun Yu and Little Que'er
steps.markdown: Go to ◀Jueyun Karst▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Jueyun_Karst▷ to search for ◀Sun Yu▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Sun_Yu▷ and ◀Little Que'er▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Little_Que%27er▷

steps.plaintext: Go to Mt. Hulao to search for traces of "Big Sis"
steps.markdown: Go to ◀Mt. Hulao▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Mt._Hulao▷ to search for traces of "Big Sis"
